_source.short_desc: OnPay's award-winning payroll and HR saves business owners over 15 hours a month and frees them up to focus on what's most important.
_source.long_desc: Growing businesses love OnPay for its flexible payroll and HR. It gets top customer ratings from Capterra, PCMag Editors' Choice, and was named the "Best Payroll Service for Small Businesses" by the experts at Forbes. Pay employees in minutes, automate taxes, and add payroll to QuickBooks or Xero. It's just $40 plus $6 per person each month for payroll, HR tools, and the option to add benefits in all 50 states -- the best value among premium payroll providers.
_source.pricing_details: First month free, base fee of $40 + $6 per employee per month
_source.target_audience: OnPay is for business owners (and their advisors) who want to simplify payroll and HR with intuitive software, expert support, and the very best Quickbooks and Xero integrations.

media.caption: Full-service payroll and automated tax filings
A full set of HR tools

category_features.name: 401(k) Tracking
category_features.definition: Track 401(k) participant contributions and employer match

category_features.name: Benefits Management
category_features.definition: Record employee's benefit plans and selections throughout career progression

category_features.name: Check Printing
category_features.definition: Print paychecks

category_features.name: Direct Deposit
category_features.definition: Digitally deposit correct payroll amounts into individual worker bank accounts

category_features.name: Multi-Country
category_features.definition: Pay employees in multiple countries using correct currencies and correct tax deduction amounts

category_features.name: Multi-State
category_features.definition: Pay employees in multiple states with correct tax deduction amounts in each

category_features.name: Payroll Outsourcing
category_features.definition: Delegate payroll processing to third party vendors

category_features.name: Payroll Reporting
category_features.definition: View and track metrics such as payslips, salary and benefits statements, etc.

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Tax Compliance
category_features.definition: Track tax-related transactions, tax remittance and tax reporting for various groups of employees and contractors

category_features.name: Vacation/Leave Tracking
category_features.definition: Request, track, and manage time off requests and vacation time

category_features.name: W-2 Preparation
category_features.definition: Automatically create and distribute W-2/1099 tax forms to employees.

category_features.name: Wage Garnishment
category_features.definition: Automatically subtract garnishments from wages

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Audit Management
category_features.definition: Plan, schedule and execute organization's accounts and assets to ensure they all comply with policies, laws, and requirements

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Controls Audit
category_features.definition: Establish requirements for testing to reduce risks

category_features.name: Environmental Compliance
category_features.definition: Guidelines for conforming to environmental laws, regulations and requirements

category_features.name: FDA Compliance
category_features.definition: Guidelines for regulating the safety of a wide range of products (ie: food, drugs, cosmetics, etc.)

category_features.name: HIPAA Compliant
category_features.definition: Compliant with HIPAA, which sets standards for sensitive patient data protection

category_features.name: ISO Compliance
category_features.definition: Guidelines set by the International Organization for Standardization

category_features.name: Incident Management
category_features.definition: Identify, resolve and restore unplanned service failures/disruptions or injuries

category_features.name: OSHA Compliance
category_features.definition: Guidelines set by Occupational Safety and Health Administration regarding record keeping

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflows

category_features.name: Risk Management
category_features.definition: Identify, evaluate, mitigate, and report on risk

category_features.name: Sarbanes-Oxley Compliance
category_features.definition: Regulations on a company?s internal process when dealing with financial reporting

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Applicant Tracking
category_features.definition: Find and manage potential candidates and their applications and resumes through the recruiting life cycle

category_features.name: Benefits Management
category_features.definition: Record employee's benefit plans and selections throughout career progression

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Employee Database
category_features.definition: Electronic storage of staff contact information and job status

category_features.name: Employee Profiles
category_features.definition: Create and view customizable employee profiles to track important information (e.g. job title, manager, contact info, etc.).

category_features.name: Onboarding
category_features.definition: Process of familiarizing new stakeholders with the company, a new location, or a service

category_features.name: Payroll Management
category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Recruitment Management
category_features.definition: Tools to find, attract and asses potential candidates for open job positions within a company

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Time & Attendance
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee's work hours to improve payroll accuracy

category_features.name: Time Off Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage employee time-off, vacation, and sick leave requests

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: E-Verify/I-9 Forms
category_features.definition: Verify the identity and employment authorization of individuals hired for employment in the United States

category_features.name: Electronic Forms
category_features.definition: Digital forms that are shared and accessed online

category_features.name: Electronic Signature
category_features.definition: Sign a document within the system

category_features.name: Employee Handbook
category_features.definition: Create and share a new employee handbook with helpful information

category_features.name: Job Description Management
category_features.definition: Create, share, and manage the distribution of job descriptions/duties

category_features.name: Orientation Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create,assign and specify order of tasks to be completed in order to prepare a new hire for his job role

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Training Management
category_features.definition: Track employee's progression through training programs

related_products.short_desc: ADP Workforce Now is a human capital management solution for companies with more than 50 employees.
related_products.features:
The core capabilities of the solution are human resources management, payroll, benefits, talent management, compliance, time & labor management, analytics & benchmarking. 
The fully integrated suite is built on a single database, which automates data synchronization across different components and helps users to minimize manual administrative tasks. The platform also integrates with other HR and business applications via the ADP Marketplace and APIs.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime. Used by over 4.5 million customers, QuickBooks provides smart tools for your business, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage expenses, send invoices, track inventory, and even run payroll. With QuickBooks Online, you can get organized, save time, and even get paid fast by adding payment features. Best of all, you can try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Gusto is the all-in-one HR platform for growing businesses-one place to hire, pay, insure, and manage your hardworking team.
related_products.features:
With over a decade of experience, Gusto provides award-winning, all-in-one payroll for businesses of all sizes. With Gusto's streamlined platform, payroll takes just a few clicks. You get unlimited payroll runs, your payroll taxes are automatically filed for you, and you even get help with compliance.

There's a reason more than 200,000 businesses trust Gusto with their payroll needs. In fact, 85% of surveyed customers say Gusto is easier to use than their last payroll provider.

related_products.short_desc: Online payroll solutions for small business owners. Run payroll in 3 easy steps.Low pricing with no surprise fees. Try it free!
related_products.features:
Best in value, user-friendly, value for money, and customer service according to users over the competition. Made for USA  small business owners with 1-100 employees. Choose the payroll option right for you:
Basic Payroll - base price $10/mo. + $4 per employee.
Full Service Payroll - Base price $30/mo + $4 per employee.  You run payroll, but let us handle the payroll tax filings.
Free direct deposit, or print paychecks.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline HR and payroll processes and get fast access to employee data using one intuitive platform. Get 3 Months Free Payroll*!
related_products.features: Paycor empowers leaders to modernize every aspect of people management so they can focus on what really matters: building winning teams. Processing payroll and managing tax compliance can be a time-consuming task for your team. But with Paycor, businesses can pay employees quickly and confidently from anywhere. Key features include general ledger integration, OnDemand Pay, AutoRun functionality, employee self-service, powerful reporting tools and compliance expertise. Get 3 Months Free Payroll*!

related_products.short_desc: BambooHR makes running payroll easy, quick, and stress-free by offering a single source of data, a comprehensive payroll solution.
related_products.features: Instead of spending hours each month manually transferring data and worrying about accuracy, BambooHR makes running your payroll easy, quick, and stress-free. Data updates in BambooHR automatically flow into payroll to virtually eliminate data double entry. And with comprehensive payroll reporting, superior customer support, and full-service tax filing, you'll save time and worry on payroll-setting you free to focus on other important initiatives.

related_products.short_desc: Rippling is the #1 Rated Payroll & HR software. Easily manage your Payroll, Benefits, Compliance, and more--all in one, modern system.
related_products.features: Rippling is The #1 Rated Payroll & HR Software. You can onboard new hires in 90 seconds, run payroll with a click, and pay employees or contractors, anywhere. And with Rippling, you can also manage your people's offer letters, I-9's, health insurance, time off, and more -- 100% online and paperlessly. All in one, modern platform.

related_products.short_desc: Hubstaff has payroll, invoicing, reporting, scheduling, and more. No credit card is required. Start a free trial today!
related_products.features: Improve payment inefficiency with Hubstaff. Manage payroll, reporting, scheduling, and more through one dashboard. Hubstaff integrates with over 30 apps so your business can run more efficiently, including Paypal, Wise, Payoneer, Quickbooks, Gusto, and more. Start automating and sending payments in a snap with Hubstaff. Available for Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS & Android.

related_products.short_desc: Manage payroll, online or in-house, and save money on time tracking, reports, and processing payroll.
related_products.features: Paychex Flex is an all-in-one Payroll & HR solution that you can build on as your business grows or changes. Use it to run payroll and integrate your HR administration, retirement, and insurance management with service the way you want it and our expert knowledge of the regulations that could affect your business. Get 3 months of free payroll processing for a limited time. Click the link to get the details.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: The smarter way for a small business to manage an hourly team. Time clocks, scheduling, payroll, messaging, and HR all in one.
related_products.features:
Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Paylocity's comprehensive product suite delivers a unified platform for professionals to make strategic HR and payroll decisions!
similar_products.features: Paylocity's comprehensive product suite delivers a unified platform for professionals to make strategic decisions in the areas of benefits, core HR, payroll, talent, and workforce management, while cultivating a modern workplace and improving employee engagement. The platform can be accessed 24*7 from any given location using the mobile application.

similar_products.features: Paycor empowers leaders to modernize every aspect of people management so they can focus on what really matters: building winning teams. Key features include general ledger integration, OnDemand Pay, AutoRun functionality, employee self-service, powerful reporting tools and compliance expertise. Get 3 Months Free Payroll*!

similar_products.short_desc:
Payroll and compliance built for the worldwide workforce.
Pay your team with one-click payments and let Deel handle taxes and benefits.
similar_products.features:
Deel is global payroll and compliant hiring built for remote teams, where anyone, anywhere can get hired and paid. Instantly hire full-time employees or independent contractors across the world legally, in minutes. 

With Deel, companies take care of payroll and create localized legal contracts in over 150 countries using a tech-enabled self-serve process.

Deel serves more than 4,500 customers, from SMBs to publicly traded companies.

similar_products.short_desc: Set up your whole team: employees, contractors, or both with Square Payroll.
similar_products.features: Payroll has never been easier with Square Payroll. Square handles your federal and state payroll taxes including withholdings, payments, and filings. Small businesses and large companies can easily pay both hourly and salaried employees. Set your sick leave or paid time off policy for each team member, and Square's online payroll services take care of the rest. Switching providers is also simple - tell us your current provider, upload existing reports, and we take care of the rest.

similar_products.short_desc: Online payroll solutions for small business owners. Run payroll in 3 easy steps.Low pricing with no surprise fees. Try it free!
similar_products.features:
Best in value, user-friendly, value for money, and customer service according to users over the competition. Made for USA  small business owners with 1-100 employees. Choose the payroll option right for you:
Basic Payroll - base price $10/mo. + $4 per employee.
Full Service Payroll - Base price $30/mo + $4 per employee.  You run payroll, but let us handle the payroll tax filings.
Free direct deposit, or print paychecks.

similar_products.short_desc: Papaya's payroll automation promotes scalability, compliance, accuracy, and security. It delivers unprecedented visibility & control.
similar_products.features:
Papaya's cloud-based SaaS platform automates global payroll end-to-end - from people to payroll to payments - in over 160 countries. Companies can upgrade their outdated legacy payroll software to Papaya's groundbreaking platform without ripping and replacing their network of local partners.
Papaya can integrate with the companies' network in one payroll cycle. All payroll data is automatically verified though built-in compliance and accuracy engines to ensure a perfect payroll every time.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage and pay global contractors and employees with just a few clicks in our easy-to-use global HR and payroll platform.
similar_products.features: Remote makes it easy to run a remote global organization. Our simple yet powerful platform lets you go from getting salary estimates to issuing your first payslip in just a few clicks. Plus, our streamlined documentation, time off requests, and approval systems keep payroll management simple so you can focus on growing your business.

similar_products.short_desc: HR/Payroll solution that processes payroll, employee onboarding/management, payroll/tax compliance, payroll reports, benefits, and more
similar_products.features:
Cloud9HR Software is designed for easy navigation and daily use ranging from employee onboarding/management to payroll and supporting reports. With 25 years of Payroll an HR experience we made this software easy to use to achieve accurate payroll and tax compliance for novice to very experienced administrators, PEO's and business owners.  Cloud9HR is for companies that are US based with 1 or more W2 employees.  It supports 1099.  
You will be supported by a team of responsive usage experts.

similar_products.short_desc: Atlas spans all aspects of human experience management, so you can fast-track global ambition and simplify HR set-up.
similar_products.features: Atlas enables innovative companies to compete in a global economy, believing that businesses should employ whomever they want, wherever the talent exists. As the largest Direct Employer of Record (EOR), Atlas is a technology platform that is supported by experts and delivers flexibility for companies to expand across borders, onboard talent, manage compliance, and pay their global workforce without the need for a local entity or multiple third-party providers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Attendance Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Attendance Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Attendance Tracking software helps organizations manage the whereabouts of their employees. These applications track an employee's vacation time off, sick time off, overtime, and absences. The software also searches for patterns in absences. Attendance Tracking software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Time Clock software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Benefits Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Benefits Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Benefits Administration software helps HR professionals organize employee information for medical, dental, 401K, disability and retirement benefits. This software helps ensure compliance with benefit eligibility and COBRA standards, and tracks benefit spending for companies in nearly any industry. These solutions also include benefit statement software and benefit plan software. Benefits Administration software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Compensation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Compensation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Compensation Management software helps organizations improve employees' motivation and retention by structuring performance-based benefits, streamlining payment adjustments across the company and tracking compensation payouts. Compensation Management software is related to Talent Management software, Performance Appraisal software, Commission software and Payroll software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.
